title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8107.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8107.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) CR 64 between

Route 14 and the Big Flats town line, in the Village of Horseheads and the Town
of Horseheads. (b) Route 14 between

Route 17 and 13th Street in the Village of Elmira Heights, Town of Horseheads
and Village of Horseheads. (c) Grand Central Avenue between 13th Street and the Penn Yan Express terminal at

Clemens Parkway, in the City of Elmira, Village of Elmira Heights and Town of

Elmira. (d) Route 14. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Route 14 between CR 64 and the Schuyler
county line, in the Villages of Horseheads and Millport and the Towns of

Horseheads, Catlin and Veteran. (e) Wygant Road, CR 21, between Route 14 and the entrance drive to the Horseheads

Industrial Park (formerly called the Holding Point), in the Village of

Horseheads and the Town of Horseheads. (f) Route 13, the northbound and southbound
roadways, between Route 17 and the Schuyler county line in the Towns of

Horseheads and Veteran. (g) Grand

Central Avenue (CR 66), between Route 17 and Oakwood Avenue in the Village of

Horseheads and the Town of Horseheads. (h) West Philo Road, CR 70, from Route 14 to

Horowitz Paper Company terminal at the west end of West Philo Road, CR 70, in
the Town of Horseheads and the Village of Horseheads. (i) Route 14. Route 15 between the

Pennsylvania/New York state line and the southerly City of Elmira city line in
the Towns of Ashland and Southport. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8107.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
